english.segment1: somthing lit up the room. i think that somthing was you. something broke through the gloom. i think that somthing was you. you color came and killed the gray. you're new pears eve everyday, everyday. somthing lit up the room. somthing lit up the room. i think that somthing was you. we'll be taking off soon. i'll hold your hand to the moon. you stop the world and hit rewind. i'm in your web so be kind, be kind
